    FOKUS questionnaire schema

Questionnaire item keys

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
qstnr_item_keys.Rd

A tibble of item keys supported in the raw FOKUS questionnaire data.

Format

A tibble.

See also

Other FOKUS metadata functions: all_argument_sides, all_ballot_dates, all_ballot_types, all_cantons, all_lvls, all_postal_dispatch_types, all_postal_dispatch_ways, all_prcds, all_proposal_types, all_response_option_types

Examples

fokus:::qstnr_item_keys
#> # A tibble: 23 × 9
#>    key              is_scalar is_iterator is_excluder is_optional type      default                  remarks                                             defau…¹
#>    <chr>            <lgl>     <lgl>       <lgl>       <lgl>       <chr>     <chr>                    <chr>                                               <list> 
#>  1 lvl              FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       character "\"?\""                  "political-level loop iterator"                     <chr>  
#>  2 i                FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       integer   "NA_integer_"            "2nd-level loop iterator"                           <int>  
#>  3 j                FALSE     TRUE        FALSE       FALSE       integer   "NA_integer_"            "3rd-level loop iterator, i.e. \"for each `lvl`, i… <int>  
#>  4 block            TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       character "*top-level block name*" "holds the name of the respective top-level block;… <chr>  
#>  5 variable_name    TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       character "\"???\""                "aka \"Variablenname\"; mustn't have any subkeys (… <chr>  
#>  6 who              TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       FALSE       character "\"alle\""               "aka \"Wer\""                                       <chr>  
#>  7 topic            TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        character  NA                      "aka \"Thema\""                                     <chr>  
#>  8 question_intro_i TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        character  NA                      "1st-priority part of \"Frage\", only included if … <chr>  
#>  9 question_intro_j TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        character  NA                      "2nd-priority part of \"Frage\", only included if … <chr>  
#> 10 question         TRUE      FALSE       FALSE       TRUE        character  NA                      "last-priority part of \"Frage\", always included"  <chr>
